content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Ore Mine at position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(-46.0, 71.0)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(-44.5, 72.5) that inputs into a Furnace at position(-45.0, 74.0)
Consists of a BeltGroup that connects the Burner Mining Drill to the Burner Inserter

### Iron Ore Mine at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position(16.0, 71.0)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(17.5, 72.5) that inputs into a Chest at position(16.5, 72.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(17.5, 71.5) that extracts from the Burner Mining Drill

### Iron Plate Smelter at position(20.0, 75.0)
Consists of a Stone Furnace at position(20.0, 75.0)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(17.5, 72.5) that inputs into the Furnace indirectly
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(18.5, 75.5) that extracts from the Furnace into a Chest at position(17.5, 75.5)

### Copper Plate Smelter at position(-45.0, 74.0)
Consists of a Stone Furnace at position(-45.0, 74.0)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(-44.5, 72.5) that inputs into the Furnace
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(-44.5, 76.5) that extracts from the Furnace into a Chest at position(-44.5, 75.5)

### Electronic Circuit Factory at position(-42.5, 0.5)
Consists of an Assembling Machine at position(-42.5, 0.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position(-40.5, -1.5) that inputs into the Assembling Machine
Consists of a Chest at position(-42.5, -1.5) that contains Copper Cable

### Electricity Generator at position(-5.5, 2.0)
Consists of an Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of a Boiler at position(-5.5, 2.0)
Consists of a Steam Engine at position(-0.5, 5.5)
Consists of a PipeGroup that connects the Offshore Pump to the Boiler
Consists of a PipeGroup that connects the Boiler to the Steam Engine
Consists of an ElectricityGroup that connects the Steam Engine to the Assembling Machine and other entities

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to insert items into electricity
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

### Errors when crafting items without the required sub-ingredients or machines
- Check that you have the required sub-ingredients and machines before attempting to craft an item.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure that all variables are defined before using them in your code.

### Errors when attempting to retrieve non-existent entities at a specific position
- Verify that an entity of the specified type exists at the given position before attempting to retrieve it.

### Errors when extracting items from entities that are not ready or do not contain the item
- Ensure that the entity contains the item and is in a state ready for extraction before attempting to extract.

### Errors and when placing entities at occupied positions
- Ensure that the target position is not occupied by another entity before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when placing entities next to other entities with insufficient spacing
- Increase the spacing or adjust the direction when placing entities next to other entities.

### Errors when attempting to place entities too far away from the player's position
- Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.

### Errors when entities are not receiving power
- Ensure that entities are connected to a power source before attempting to use them.

### Errors when using incorrect arguments in functions
- Check the function definition and ensure that the correct number and types of arguments are being passed.

### Errors when connecting transport belts directly to non-inserter entities
- Use an inserter to transfer items between entities and transport belts.

### Errors when connecting entities with invalid paths
- Ensure that the path between entities is valid and not obstructed.

### Errors when attempting to access non-existent attributes of entities
- Verify that the attribute exists for the entity before attempting to access it.

### Errors when attempting to use undefined names
- Ensure that all names are defined before using them
